thread.section_title: Fake Dee comeback, shock romance and huge return: Neighbours boss reveals 9 big spoilers ahead – Metro
thread.title: Fake Dee comeback, shock romance and huge return: Neighbours boss reveals 9 big spoilers ahead
thread.title_full: Fake Dee comeback, shock romance and huge return: Neighbours boss reveals 9 big spoilers ahead

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: Fake Dee comeback, shock romance and huge return: Neighbours boss reveals 9 big spoilers ahead
text:
(Picture: Fremantle Media) If you thought that the Fake Dee saga was going to be the height of the Neighbours drama this year then think again! Producer Jason Herbison has given all of the right signs that things won’t die down any time soon with shocking secrets, historic returns, new conflicts and a surprising new romance. 
In an interview with Digital Spy , the boss dropped the following hints on what’s ahead – including a hint that Andrea, who had mocked herself up as Dee, could well be back in the future for the next part in the controversial story.
Fake Dee – Act Two! (Picture: Fremantle Media) The truth is out and Andrea has been exposed as an imposter! But don’t let your guard down as there is every chance that she could return in the future.
Jason hinted: ‘Absolutely. In my dreamscape this is Act One.’
And could the real Dee still be out there? Jason is keeping an open mind, adding:’ Anything is possible. All that’s happened is that we’ve met a woman who bears a remarkable resemblance to Dee. We have not answered any questions about what happened to the real Dee. I respect that she’s a beloved character and many fans want to see her alive.’
What next for Willow? Jason shared: ‘I love the Willow character. It’s always a great dynamic when you have a child who’s forced to parent an adult. She really was a leaf blown about in the breeze created by Andrea. I thought Meike did a terrific job. There’s every chance you will see her again.’
All over for Toadie and Sonya? (Picture: Fremantle Media) With both of the characters having made mistakes, it remains to be seen whether these two can ever restore their relationship. With Toadie having rediscovered his love and hurt for Dee, even having slept with Andrea, can Sonya forgive him and can Toadie move on?
Or is it the end of the road?
Daddy drama! (Picture: Fremantle Media) There’s a shocking twist ahead as Leo and David discover the identity of their father and Jason has promised that the revelation will send shockwaves through Erinsborough. It will also be the catalyst for a historical return that could be a big surprise for a few residents and viewers alike.
A surprise new romance! No details were given on this aside from the fact that two characters who have previously had little to do with one another will grow close and form a relationship. Hmmm, we wonder who that could be…
A new war for Susan (Fremantle Media) Challenges lie ahead for Susan as Finn ups his determination to usurp her as Principal at Erinsborough High. What lengths is he set to go to to undermine Susan and will he be successful? Susan certainly has a war on her hands!
Health drama One character is set to battle an illness that will force them to seek support and confront their health. As they deal with the consequences of their diagnosis, they will come into contact with someone who is enduring something similar – can the pair help each other through their ordeals?
Old school Neighbours! It’s not all health drama and war in Neighbours over the next few months – an old school feel community storyline will also kick off which will bring more light hearted interactions and allow the soap to spruce up one of their backlot locations…
Wedding bells? One pair are going to get angaged. Who will it be? Will they make it down the aisle? We’ll just have to wait and see…
You can read the full interview with Jason on Digital Spy.
